= **{{Slim ACS}}**
[[include :scp-wiki:component:author-label-source end=--]]
----

This is //Slim ACS//, a component based on the [[[anomaly-classification-system-guide|Anomaly Classification System]]], and inspired by [[[theme:basalt|BASALT]]], the [[[component:acs-animation|ACS Animation Component]]] & the [[[component:customizable-acs|Mega Cool Customizable ACS Add-On]]]; with darkmode being based on [[[theme:night-rush-theme|Night Rush Theme]]].

[[div class="meta-title" style="text-transform: uppercase; margin-block-end: -0.5rem; font-size: 160%;"]]
What It Does
[[/div]]

As you will see, it removes the danger diamond from ACS and the circles in which class icons are located.
Furthermore, it changes the font to one I find more visually pleasing (Monserrat), although this can be easily changed.

It also includes a built-in dark mode to use with dark themes, which changes icons to be more neon-looking; and customizable classes.

[[span style="font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif; user-select: none;"]]Other than standard classes, Slim ACS has some esoteric classes that I/someone I know have used, if you want me to add another one, send me a Wikidot DM to [[*user TheDarkArtist]] or something. Also, if you want to know what some of these classes are, [[[esoteric-classes-complete-list|here's the esoteric classes list]]].[[/span]]

[[span style="font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif; user-select: none;"]]However, if you'd rather make the class by yourself, here's the code necessary to do that:[[/span]]

[[code type="CSS]]
.class-name {
       --img-main: url('IMAGE URL');
       --clr-class: 0 0 0 /* << Change those values for your color, in RGB, & don't add commas, they *will* break the transparency */;
}
[[/code]]
